question: Which Olympic Games is also known as the "Centennial Olympic Games"?
explanation: The 1996 Summer Olympics, Atlanta is also known as the "Centennial Olympic Games". The 1996 Summer Olympics, officially known as the Games of the XXVI Olympiad, commonly known as Atlanta 1996, and also referred to as the Centennial Olympic Games, were an international multi-sport event that was held from July 19 to August 4, 1996, in Atlanta, Georgia. These Games, which were the fourth Summer Olympics to be hosted by the United States, marked the centennial of the 1896 Summer Olympics in Athensâ€”the inaugural edition of the modern Olympic Games.
